profile_summary:
As a skilled Senior Golang Engineer with expertise in **Golang**, I possess 8 years of full-stack development experience, with a strong focus on building high-performance applications. My technical proficiencies include **Kubernetes**, **Microservices**, **API** design, and integrating **event-driven** architectures. I have a solid foundation in **Continuous Integration** practices and **Version Control**, ensuring high-quality code and efficient collaboration within teams.
In addition to my primary focus on **Golang**, I bring experience in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, which enhances my versatility across various projects. My background includes leading the development of enterprise-grade platforms, particularly in the healthcare and financial sectors, with an emphasis on compliance standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS. I have effectively utilized tools such as **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow** for machine learning pipelines and MLOps workflows, demonstrating my capability in building robust, data-driven solutions. I thrive in startup environments, leveraging a collaborative approach to task decomposition and problem solving.
